original: śrīkulaśekharanṛpativiracitā mukundamālā
analyzed: śrī kulaśekhara nṛpati viracitā mukundamālā

original: vande mukundamaravindadalāyatākṣaṃ kundenduśaṅkhadaśanaṃ śiśugopaveṣam /
analyzed: vande mukundam aravinda dala āyata akṣam kunda indu śaṅkha daśanam śiśu gopa veṣam

original: indrādidevagaṇavanditapādapīṭhaṃ vṛndāvanālayamahaṃ vasudevasūnum // KMuk_1 //
analyzed: indra ādi deva gaṇa vandita pāda pīṭham vṛndāvana ālayam aham vasudeva sūnum

original: jayatu jayatu devo devakīnandano 'yaṃ jayatu jayatu kṛṣṇo vṛṣṇivaṃśapradīpaḥ /
analyzed: jayatu jayatu devaḥ devakīnandanaḥ yam jayatu jayatu kṛṣṇaḥ vṛṣṇi vaṃśa pradīpaḥ

original: jayatu jayatu meghaśyāmalaḥ komalāṅgo jayatu jayatu pṛthvībhāranāśo mukundaḥ // KMuk_2 //
analyzed: jayatu jayatu megha śyāmalaḥ komala aṅgaḥ jayatu jayatu pṛthvī bhāra nāśaḥ mukundaḥ

original: mukunda mūrdhnā praṇipatya yāce bhavantamekāntamiyantamartham /
analyzed: mukunda mūrdhnā praṇipatya yāce bhavantam ekāntam iyantam artham

original: avismṛtistvaccaraṇāravinde bhave bhave me 'sti bhavatprasādāt // KMuk_3 //
analyzed: a vismṛtiḥ tvad caraṇa aravinde bhave bhave me sti bhavat prasādāt

original: śrīmukundapadāmbhojamadhunaḥ paramādbhutam /
analyzed: śrī mukunda pada ambhoja madhunaḥ parama adbhutam

original: yatpāyino na muhyanti muhyanti yadapāyinaḥ // KMuk_4 //
analyzed: yad pāyinaḥ na muhyanti muhyanti yad a pāyinaḥ

original: nāhaṃ vande tava caraṇayordvandvamadvandvahetoḥ kumbhīpākaṃ gurumapi hare nārakaṃ nāpanetum /
analyzed: na aham vande tava caraṇayoḥ dvandvam a dvandva hetoḥ kumbhīpākam gurum api hare nārakam nā apanetum

original: ramyā rāmā mṛdutanulatā nandane nāpi rantuṃ bhāve bhāve hṛdayabhavane bhāvaye 'haṃ bhavantam // KMuk_5 //
analyzed: ramyāḥ rāmāḥ mṛdu tanu latāḥ nandane nā api rantum bhāve bhāve hṛdaya bhavane bhāvaye ham bhavantam

original: nāsthā dharme na vasunicaye naiva kāmopabhoge yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhavatu bhagavanpūrvakarmānurūpam /
analyzed: nā āsthā dharme na vasu nicaye nā eva kāma upabhoge yat bhāvyam tat bhavatu bhagavan pūrva karma anurūpam

original: etatprārthyaṃ mama bahumataṃ janmajanmāntare 'pi tvatpādāmbhoruhayugagatā niścalā bhaktirastu // KMuk_6 //
analyzed: etat prārthyam mama bahu matam janma janmāntare tvad pāda ambhoruha yuga gatā niścalā bhaktiḥ astu

original: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntake prakāmam /
analyzed: divi vā bhuvi vā mama astu vāsaḥ narake vā naraka antake prakāmam

original: avadhīritaśāradāravindau caraṇau te maraṇe 'pi cintayāmi // KMuk_7 //
analyzed: avadhīrita śārada aravindau caraṇau te maraṇe cintayāmi

original: sarasijanayane saśaṅkhacakre murabhidi mā virameha citta rantum /
analyzed: sarasija nayane sa śaṅkha cakre murabhidi mā virama iha citta rantum

original: sukhakaramaparaṃ na jātu jāne haricaraṇasmaraṇāmṛtena tulyam // KMuk_8 //
analyzed: sukha karam aparam na jātu jāne hari caraṇa smaraṇa amṛtena tulyam

original: mā bhairmandamano vicintya bahudhā yāmīściraṃ yātanā nāmī naḥ prabhavanti pāparipavaḥ svāmī nanu śrīdharaḥ /
analyzed: mā bhaiḥ manda manaḥ vicintya bahudhā yāmīḥ ciram yātanāḥ nā amī naḥ prabhavanti pāpa ripavaḥ svāmī nanu śrīdharaḥ

original: ālasyaṃ vyapanīya bhaktisulabhaṃ dhyāyasva nārāyaṇaṃ lokasya vyasanāpanodanakaro dāsasya kiṃ na kṣamaḥ // KMuk_9 //
analyzed: ālasyam vyapanīya bhakti sulabham dhyāyasva nārāyaṇam lokasya vyasana apanodana karaḥ dāsasya kim na kṣamaḥ

original: bhavajaladhimagādhaṃ dustaraṃ nistareyaṃ kathamahamiti ceto mā sma gāḥ kātaratvam /
analyzed: bhava jaladhim agādham dustaram nistareyam katham aham iti cetaḥ mā sma gāḥ kātara tvam

original: sarasijadṛśi deve tāvakī bhaktirekā narakabhidi niṣaṇṇā tārayiṣyatyavaśyam // KMuk_10 //
analyzed: sarasija dṛśi deve tāvakī bhaktiḥ ekā naraka bhidi niṣaṇṇā tārayiṣyati avaśyam

original: tṛṣṇātoye madanapavanoddhūtamohormimāle dārāvarte sahajatanayagrāhasaṃghākule ca /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā toye madana pavana uddhūta moha ūrmi māle dāra āvarte sahaja tanaya grāha saṃgha ākule ca

original: saṃsārākhye mahati jaladhau majjatāṃ nastridhāmanpādāmbhoje varada bhavato bhaktināve prasīda // KMuk_11 //
analyzed: saṃsāra ākhye mahati jaladhau majjatām naḥ tridhāman pāda ambhoje vara da bhavataḥ bhakti nāve prasīda

original: pṛthvīreṇuraṇuḥ payāṃsi kaṇikāḥ phalguḥ sphuliṅgo laghustejo niḥśvasanaṃ maruttanutaraṃ randhraṃ susūkṣmaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvī reṇuḥ aṇuḥ payāṃsi kaṇikāḥ phalguḥ sphuliṅgaḥ laghuḥ tejaḥ niḥśvasanam marut tanutaram randhram su sūkṣmam nabhaḥ

original: kṣudrā rudrapitāmahaprabhṛtayaḥ kīṭāḥ samastāḥ surā dṛṣṭe yatra sa tāvako vijayate bhūmāvadhūtāvadhiḥ // KMuk_12 //
analyzed: kṣudrāḥ rudra pitāmaha prabhṛtayaḥ kīṭāḥ samastāḥ surāḥ dṛṣṭe yatra sa tāvakaḥ vijayate bhūma avadhūta avadhiḥ

original: āmnāyābhyasanānyaraṇyaruditaṃ kṛcchravratānyanvahaṃ medaśchedapadāni pūrtavidhayaḥ sarve hutaṃ bhasmani /
analyzed: āmnāya abhyasanāni araṇyaruditam kṛcchra vratāni anvaham medaḥ cheda padāni pūrta vidhayaḥ sarve hutam bhasmani

original: tīrthānāmavagāhanāni ca gajasnānaṃ vinā yatpadadvandvāmbhoruhasaṃstutiṃ vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ // KMuk_13 //
analyzed: tīrthānām avagāhanāni ca gajasnānam vinā yat pada dvandva ambhoruha saṃstutim vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ

original: ānanda govinda mukunda rāma nārāyaṇānanta nirāmayeti /
analyzed: ānanda govinda mukunda rāma nārāyaṇa ananta nirāmaya iti

original: vaktuṃ samartho 'pi na vakti kaścidaho janānāṃ vyasanāni mokṣe // KMuk_14 //
analyzed: vaktum na vakti kaścid aho janānām vyasanāni mokṣe

original: kṣīrasāgarataraṅgaśīkarāsāratārakitacārumūrtaye /
analyzed: kṣīrasāgara taraṅga śīkara āsāra tārakita cāru mūrtaye

original: bhogibhogaśayanīyaśāyine mādhavāya madhuvidviṣe namaḥ // KMuk_15 //
analyzed: bhogi bhoga śayanīya śāyine mādhavāya madhuvidviṣe namaḥ

original: vātsalyādabhayapradānasamayādārtārtinirvāpaṇādaudāryādaghaśoṣaṇādagaṇitaśreyaḥpadaprāpaṇāt /
analyzed: vātsalyāt abhaya pradāna samayāt ārta ārti nirvāpaṇāt audāryāt agha śoṣaṇāt a gaṇita śreyaḥ pada prāpaṇāt

original: sevyaḥ śrīpatireva sarvajagatāmekāntataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ prahlādaśca vibhīṣaṇaśca karirāṭ pāñcālyahalyā dhruvaḥ // KMuk_16 //
analyzed: sevyaḥ śrīpatiḥ eva sarva jagatām ekāntataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ prahlādaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca kari rāj pāñcālī ahalyā dhruvaḥ

original: nāthe śrīpuruṣottame trijagatāmekādhipe cetasā sevye svasya padasya dātari pare nārāyaṇe tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: nāthe śrī puruṣottame tri jagatām eka adhipe cetasā sevye svasya padasya dātari pare nārāyaṇe tiṣṭhati

original: yaṃ kaṃcitpuruṣādhamaṃ katipayagrāmeśamalpādarthadaṃ sevāyai mṛgayāmahe naramaho mūḍhā varākā vayam // KMuk_17 //
analyzed: yam kaṃcid puruṣa adhamam katipaya grāma īśam alpāt artha dam sevāyai mṛgayāmahe naram aho mūḍhāḥ varākāḥ vayam

original: bho lokāḥ śṛṇuta prasūtimaraṇavyādheścikitsāmimāṃ yogajñāḥ samudāharanti munayo yāṃ yājñavalkyādayaḥ /
analyzed: bho lokāḥ śṛṇuta prasūti maraṇa vyādheḥ cikitsām imām yoga jñāḥ samudāharanti munayaḥ yām yājñavalkya ādayaḥ

original: antarjyotirameyamekamamṛtaṃ kṛṣṇākhyamāpīyatāṃ yatpītaṃ paramauṣadhaṃ vitanute nirvāṇamātyantikam // KMuk_18 //
analyzed: antar jyotiḥ ameyam ekam amṛtam kṛṣṇa ākhyam āpīyatām yat pītam parama auṣadham vitanute nirvāṇam ātyantikam

original: baddhenāñjalinā natena śirasā gātraiḥ saromodgamaiḥ kaṇṭhena savaragadgadena nayanenodgīrṇabāṣpāmbunā /
analyzed: baddhena añjalinā natena śirasā gātraiḥ sa roma udgamaiḥ kaṇṭhena sa vara gadgadena nayanena udgīrṇa bāṣpa ambunā

original: nityaṃ tvaccaraṇāravindayugaladhyānāmṛtāsvādināmasmākaṃ sarasīruhākṣa satataṃ saṃpadyatāṃ jīvitam // KMuk_19 //
analyzed: nityam tvad caraṇa aravinda yugala dhyāna amṛta āsvādinām asmākam sarasīruha akṣa satatam saṃpadyatām jīvitam

original: tattvaṃ bruvāṇāni paraṃ parasmādaho kṣarantīva sudhāṃ padāni /
analyzed: tattvam bruvāṇāni param parasmāt aho kṣaranti iva sudhām padāni

original: āvartaya prāñjalirasmi jihve nāmāni nārāyaṇagocarāṇi // KMuk_20 //
analyzed: āvartaya prāñjaliḥ asmi jihve nāmāni nārāyaṇa gocarāṇi

original: idaṃ śarīraṃ pariṇāmapeśalaṃ patatyavaśyaṃ ślathasaṃdhi jarjaram /
analyzed: idam śarīram pariṇāma peśalam patati avaśyam ślatha saṃdhi jarjaram

original: kimauṣadhaiḥ kliśyasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayaṃ kṛṣṇarasāyanaṃ piba // KMuk_21 //
analyzed: kim auṣadhaiḥ kliśyasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayam kṛṣṇa rasāyanam piba

original: śrīmannāma procya nārāyaṇākhyaṃ yena prāptā vāñchitaṃ pāpino 'pi /
analyzed: śrīmat nāma procya nārāyaṇa ākhyam yena prāptāḥ vāñchitam pāpinaḥ

original: hā naḥ pūrvaṃ vākpravṛttā na tasmiṃstena prāptaṃ garbhavāsādiduḥkham // KMuk_22 //
analyzed: hā naḥ pūrvam vāc pravṛttā na tasmin tena prāptam garbha vāsa ādi duḥkham

original: mā drākṣaṃ kṣīṇapuṇyānkṣaṇamapi bhavato bhaktihīnānpadābje mā śrauṣaṃ śravyabaddhaṃ tava caritamapāsyānyadākhyānajātam /
analyzed: mā drākṣam kṣīṇa puṇyān kṣaṇam api bhavataḥ bhakti hīnān pada abje mā śrauṣam śravya baddham tava caritam apāsya anyat ākhyāna jātam

original: mā sprākṣaṃ mādhava tvāmapi bhuvanapate cetasāpahnuvānaṃ mā bhūvaṃ tvatsaparyāvyatikararahito janmajanmāntare 'pi // KMuk_23 //
analyzed: mā sprākṣam mādhava tvām api bhuvana pate cetasā apahnuvānam mā bhūvam tvad saparyā vyatikara rahitaḥ janma janmāntare pi

original: madana parihara sthitiṃ madīye manasi mukundapadāravindadhāmni /
analyzed: madana parihara sthitim madīye manasi mukunda pada aravinda dhāmni

original: haranayanakṛśānunā kṛśo 'si smarasi na cakraparākramaṃ murāreḥ // KMuk_24 //
analyzed: hara nayana kṛśānunā kṛśaḥ si smarasi na cakra parākramam murāreḥ

original: dārā vārākaravarasutā te 'ṅgajo 'yaṃ viriñcaḥ stotā vedastava suragaṇo bhṛtyavargaḥ prasādaḥ /
analyzed: dārāḥ vāra ākara vara sutā te ṅga jaḥ yam viriñcaḥ stotā vedaḥ tava sura gaṇaḥ bhṛtya vargaḥ prasādaḥ

original: muktirmadhye jagadavikalaṃ tāvake devakī te mātā mittraṃ balaripusutastattvato 'nyanna jāne // KMuk_25 //
analyzed: muktiḥ madhye jagat avikalam tāvake devakī te mātā mittram bala ripu sutaḥ tattvataḥ jāne

original: jihve kīrtaya keśavaṃ muraripuṃ ceto bhaja śrīdharaṃ pāṇidvandva samarcayācyutakathāṃ śrotradvaya tvaṃ śruṇu /
analyzed: jihve kīrtaya keśavam muraripum cetaḥ bhaja śrīdharam pāṇi dvandva samarcaya acyuta kathām śrotra dvaya tvam śruṇu

original: kṛṣṇaṃ lokaya locanadvaya harergacchāṅghriyugmālayaṃ jighra ghrāṇa mukundapādatulasīṃ murdhannamādhokṣajam // KMuk_26 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇam lokaya locana dvaya hareḥ gaccha aṅghri yugma ālayam jighra ghrāṇa mukunda pāda tulasīm murdhan nama adhokṣajam

original: yatkṛṣṇapraṇipātadhūlidhavalaṃ tadvai śiraḥ syācchubhaṃ te netre tamasojjhite surucire yābhyāṃ harirdṛśyate /
analyzed: yat kṛṣṇa praṇipāta dhūli dhavalam tat vai śiraḥ syāt śubham te netre tamasā ujjhite su rucire yābhyām hariḥ dṛśyate

original: sā buddhirniyamairyamaiśca vimalā yā mādhavadhyāyinī sā jihvāmṛtavarṣiṇī pratipadaṃ yā stauti nārāyaṇam // KMuk_27 //
analyzed: sā buddhiḥ niyamaiḥ yamaiḥ ca vimalā yā mādhava dhyāyinī sā jihvā amṛta varṣiṇī pratipadam yā stauti nārāyaṇam

original: bhaktadveṣibhujaṃgagāruḍamaṇistrailokyarakṣāmaṇirgopīlocanacātakāmbudamaṇiḥ saundaryamudrāmaṇiḥ /
śrīkāntāmaṇirukmiṇīghanakucadvandvaikabhūṣāmaṇiḥ śreyo dhyeyaśikhāmṇirdiśatu no gopālacūḍāmaṇiḥ // KMuk_28 //
analyzed: śrī kāntā maṇi rukmiṇī ghana kuca dvandva eka bhūṣā maṇiḥ śreyaḥ dhyeya śikhāmṇiḥ diśatu naḥ gopāla cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: śatrucchedaikamantraṃ sakalamupaniṣadvākyasaṃpūjyamantraṃ saṃsārottāramantraṃ samuditamanasāṃ saṅganiryāṇamantram /
analyzed: śatru cheda eka mantram sakalam upaniṣad vākya saṃpūjya mantram saṃsāra uttāra mantram samudita manasām saṅga niryāṇa mantram

original: sarvaiśvaryaikamantraṃ vyasanabhujagasaṃdaṣṭasaṃtrāṇamantraṃ jihve śrīkṛṣṇamantraṃ japa japa satataṃ janmasāphalyamantram // KMuk_29 //
analyzed: sarva aiśvarya eka mantram vyasana bhujaga saṃdaṣṭa saṃtrāṇa mantram jihve śrī kṛṣṇa mantram japa japa satatam janma sāphalya mantram

original: vyāmohoddalanauṣadhaṃ munimanovṛttipravṛttyauṣadhaṃ daityānarthakarauṣadhaṃ trijagatāṃ saṃjīvanaikauṣadham /
analyzed: vyāmoha uddalana auṣadham muni manaḥ vṛtti pravṛtti auṣadham daitya anartha kara auṣadham trijagatām saṃjīvana eka auṣadham

original: bhaktārtipraśamauṣadhaṃ bhavabhayapradhvaṃsi divyauṣadhaṃ śreyaḥprāptikarauṣadhaṃ piba manaḥ śrīkṛṣṇanāmauṣadham // KMuk_30 //
analyzed: bhakta ārti praśama auṣadham bhava bhaya pradhvaṃsi divya auṣadham śreyaḥ prāpti kara auṣadham piba manaḥ śrī kṛṣṇa nāma auṣadham

original: āścaryametaddhi manuṣyaloke sudhāṃ parityajya viṣaṃ pibanti /
analyzed: āścaryam etat hi manuṣya loke sudhām parityajya viṣam pibanti

original: nāmāni nārāyaṇagocarāṇi tyaktvānyavācaḥ kuhakāḥ paṭhanti // KMuk_31 //
analyzed: nāmāni nārāyaṇa gocarāṇi tyaktvā anya vācaḥ kuhakāḥ paṭhanti

original: lāṭīnetrapuṭīpayodharaghaṭīrevātaṭīduṣkuṭīpāṭīradrumavarṇanena kavibhirmūḍhairdinaṃ nīyate /
analyzed: lāṭī netra puṭī payodhara ghaṭī revā taṭī duṣkuṭī pāṭīra druma varṇanena kavibhiḥ mūḍhaiḥ dinam nīyate

original: govindeti janārdaneti jagatāṃ nātheti kṛṣṇeti ca vyāhāraiḥ samayastadekamanasāṃ puṃsāmatikrāmati // KMuk_32 //
analyzed: govinda iti janārdana iti jagatām nātha iti kṛṣṇa iti ca vyāhāraiḥ samayaḥ tad ekamanasām puṃsām atikrāmati

original: ayācyamakreyamayātayāmamapācyamakṣayyamadurbharaṃ me /
analyzed: a yācyam a kreyam a yātayāmam a pācyam akṣayyam a durbharam me

original: astyeva pātheyamitaḥ prayāṇe śrīkṛṣṇanāmamṛtabhāgadheyam // KMuk_33 //
analyzed: asti eva pātheyam itas prayāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa nāma mṛta bhāgadheyam

original: yasya priyau śrutadharau kavilokagītau mittre dvijanmaparivāraśivāvabhūtām /
analyzed: yasya priyau śrutadharau kavi loka gītau mittre dvijanma parivāra śiva avabhūtām

original: tenāmbujākṣacaraṇāmbujaṣaṭpadena rājñā kṛtā stutiriyaṃ kulaśekhareṇa // KMuk_34 //
analyzed: tena ambuja akṣa caraṇa ambuja ṣaṭpadena rājñā kṛtā stutiḥ iyam kulaśekhareṇa

original: iti śrīkulaśekharanṛpativiracitā mukundamālā samāptā /
analyzed: iti śrī kulaśekhara nṛpati viracitā mukundamālā samāptā
